name: g15vim
summary: Display on the Logitech G15 keyboard LCD screen.
description: This script can display on the Logitech G15 keyboard LCD screen information about the current cursor position (line and col) and the current buffer name.
install_details:
Just put the 2 files:
-draw-on-g15
-g15vim.vim
into the folder ~/.vim/plugin

You need :
-libg15 1.2.7
-libg15render 1.2
-g15Daemon 1.9.5.3
All are available on: http://www.g15tools.com/
-vim 7.2.018
It is available on: http://www.vim.org/

versions.release_notes:
Add ChangeLog file. Redirect the standard error output stream to the null
device.
